text: Was a random but satisfying find as I was nearby ‚òòÔ∏è coffeeshop still holds that nostalgic feeling of the previous generation üíô along with its benefits of cheap and tasty eats üòã you don‚Äôt have to go all the way to Chinatow to find affordable meals if you live or work in the west because this little open-air eatery seems to have it all :)
Ordered beef hor fun and was blown away - by the sub standard taste. Maybe their seafood can provide redemption but who knows. Will never try again.
Nice and affordable with lots of ingredients. Have been supporting this store for years.

I was appalled by the rude service of the boss. Was having a family dinner when the boss told us to shift to a small table when we were dining halfway (because we didnt order enough dishes). The boss did not apologise to us and we depicted and felt despised on! Do not ever patronise from them if you want to eat zichar.

VERY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE. A PRC worker is very RUDE. Asked for my order number she asked me to see if there have write the number. THE PAPER DOESNT EVEN HAVE NUMBER AND I ASKED AGAIN. SHE GOT FRUSTATED AND KEEP TELLING ME TO SEE CLOSELY. SHE CAN JUST SIMPLY SAY YES IT IS OR NO ITS NOT BUT CHOOSE TO GO A DIFFICULT ANSWER
